item.title: new comment (near Erzsébetváros, 7th district) / * 2020 August 30 11:24 zurco Updated: They made a new traffic sign for this end of Király utca / https://photos.app.goo.gl/a2W9MtX3oypFRqJ87

reactivated note (near Erzsébetváros, 7th district) / * 2020 August 18 15:15 zurco Created: Király utca 5 until Károly körút is not anymore accessible to cars. / They changed it to a dead end accessible only to bicycles. / https://photos.app.goo.gl/GUm8LdyNBZWrixiCA / * 2020 August 19 06:18 urbalazs Resolved: Fixed by the reporter. / * 2020 August 21 13:42 zurco Reactivated: / * 2020 August 21 13:43 zurco Resolved: It still shows the street as accessible by car, but it's closed/forbiden / * 2020 August 21 13:43 zurco Reactivated: / * 2020 August 21 14:40 vasony Resolved: The map is correct, tagged as motor_vehicle=no / * 2020 August 21 14:45 vasony Reactivated: / * 2020 August 21 14:46 vasony Resolved: sorry, motor_vehicle=private / means = "kivéve engedéllyel, kerékpár" / * 2020 August 30 11:24 zurco Reactivated:
